Question
========

Complete the statements on the partial correlation coefficient.

$r_{yx1.x2}$ has ... the same sign (+/-) as the $b_{1}$ in the regression prediction $hat{y} = a+b_{1}x_{1}+b_{2}x_{2}$.

The p-value belonging to the test for $r_{yx1.x2}$ is ... equal to the p-value associated with the test for $b_{1}$. 
Answerlist
----------
* Yes, not
* Not, well
* Yes, yes
* Not, not

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
